item.title: Github Actions: a concrete example with Hugo and Latex
item.description: Months ago I decided to write my curriculum using Latex and to use Github to version it (here the repository). I said to myself that it would be beautiful to automatically create the latest cv version as a pdf file whenever I update the source files, maybe as a Github release. I had the same desire when I started thinking about this blog: wouldn’t be amazing if at each new content, a new blog version was deployed automatically?
